dats_auto_update.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x must be configured to receive automatic updates

dats_updated.title: The anti-virus signature file age must not exceed 7 days

restricted_user.title: The nails user and nailsgroup group must be restricted to the least privilege access required for the intended role

scanned_media.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x must scan all media used for system maintenance prior to use

updates_source.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise must be configured to receive all patches, service packs and updates from a DoD-managed source

virus_notification.title: A notification mechanism or process must be in place to notify Administrators of out of date DAT, detected malware and error codes

web_client_disabled.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux Web interface must be disabled unless the system is on a segregated network

web_client_firewalled.title: Access to the McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x Web UI must be enforced by firewall rules

oas_action_app_primary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to Clean as first action when a virus or Trojan is detected

oas_action_app_secondary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to Quarantine if first action fails when a virus or Trojan is detected

oas_action_default_primary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to Clean as first action when programs and jokes are found

oas_action_default_secondary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to Quarantine if first action fails when programs and jokes are found

oas_action_error.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to deny access to the file if an error occurs during scanning

oas_action_timeout.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to allow access to files if scanning times out

oas_allFiles.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to scan all file types

oas_decompArchive.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to decompress archives when scanning

oas_enabled.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x must be configured to enable On-Access scanning

oas_exclusions.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must only be configured with exclusions that are documented and approved by the ISSO/ISSM/AO

oas_heuristicAnalysis.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to find unknown program viruses

oas_macroAnalysis.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to find unknown macro viruses

oas_program.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to find potentially unwanted programs

oas_scanMaxTmo.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner maximum scan time must not be less than 45 seconds

oas_scanNWFiles.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be enabled to scan mounted volumes when mounted volumes point to a network server without an anti-virus solution installed

oas_scanOnRead.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to scan files when being read from disk

oas_scanOnWrite.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Access scanner must be configured to scan files when being written to disk

ods_action_app_primary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to Clean as first action when a virus or Trojan is detected

ods_action_app_secondary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to Quarantine if first action fails when a virus or Trojan is detected

ods_action_default_primary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to Clean as first action when programs and jokes are found

ods_action_default_secondary.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to Quarantine if first action fails when programs and jokes are found

ods_allFiles.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to scan all file types

ods_decompArchive.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to decompress archives when scanning

ods_exclusions.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must only be configured with exclusions that are documented and approved by the ISSO/ISSM/AO

ods_extensions.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to include all local drives and their sub-directories

ods_macroAnalysis.title: The McAfee VirusScan Enterprise for Linux 1.9.x/2.0.x On-Demand scanner must be configured to find unknown macro viruses
